item.title: VCX Debut Post
item.description: VCX Bio / Summary: VCX is a team of data scientists, computer engineers and technology marketers studying the venture capital ecosystem. The team includes Brian Dema, Han de Jong, John Merritt and Olga Namsaraeva. Contact us for media inquiries or for custom research to answer questions around the venture landscape, VC marketing, and social media use across the tech community. Section: Clubhouse Events VC Marketing Jam #2 â€“ "Content, Content, NFTs, Oh My!
